name: PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA STATE TROOPERS' ASSOCIATION (Trooper Robert K. Johnson), Respondent
name_abbreviation: Pennsylvania State Police v. Pennsylvania State Troopers' Ass'n

parties: PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA STATE TROOPERS’ ASSOCIATION (Trooper Robert K. Johnson), Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 31st day of March, 1998, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The Motion to Consolidate this Petition for Allowance of Appeal with Pennsylvania State Police v. Pennsylvania State Troopers’ Association (Trooper Rodney Smith), No. 645 M.D. Alloc. Dkt. 1997, - Pa. -, 708 A.2d 805 (1998) is also GRANTED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA STATE TROOPERS’ ASSOCIATION (Trooper Robert K. Johnson), Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 31, 1998.
